title: Kurdish Historical Manuscripts OCR Dataset
description: A comprehensive dataset containing 15,000 images of Kurdish historical manuscripts from the 18th-20th centuries, including ground truth transcriptions and metadata about script variations and preservation conditions.
structure: Images (PNG, 300 DPI), Ground truth text files (UTF-8), Metadata (JSON format with manuscript info, date, region, script type)
cite: Mahmood, A., Ali, S., & Hassan, R. (2023). Kurdish Historical Manuscripts OCR Dataset. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-hist-ocr.v1

title: Kurdish Modern Text Corpus
description: A large-scale corpus of modern Kurdish texts containing 50 million words from diverse sources including news articles, literature, academic papers, and web content. Includes linguistic annotations and quality metadata.
structure: Plain text files organized by source and dialect, XML annotations for POS tagging, Metadata files with source information
cite: Omar, Z., Hassan, K., & Ali, A. (2023). Kurdish Modern Text Corpus v2.0. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-modern-corpus.v2

title: Kurdish-English Parallel Translation Corpus
description: High-quality parallel corpus containing 500,000 sentence pairs for Kurdish-English translation, covering multiple domains and ensuring balanced representation of both Sorani and Kurmanji dialects.
structure: Tab-separated files with aligned sentences, Metadata including domain tags and quality scores, Source attribution files
cite: Salim, N., & Rashid, L. (2023). Kurdish-English Parallel Translation Corpus. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-en-parallel.v1

title: Kurdish Morphological Analysis Dataset
description: Comprehensive morphological analysis dataset containing 100,000 Kurdish words with detailed morphological breakdowns, POS tags, and inflectional information for both Sorani and Kurmanji dialects.
structure: CSV files with word forms and analyses, XML annotation schema, Documentation for morphological features
cite: Salim, N., Rashid, L., Dilshad, S., & Tahir, N. (2023). Kurdish Morphological Analysis Dataset. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-morphology.v1

title: Kurdish Speech Recognition Audio Corpus
description: Large-scale audio corpus containing 1,000 hours of Kurdish speech from 500+ speakers across different dialects, ages, and regions. Includes high-quality transcriptions and speaker metadata.
structure: WAV audio files (16kHz, mono), Transcript files with timestamps, Speaker metadata (demographics, dialect), Phonetic alignments
cite: Kareem, H., Ahmed, R., & Jamal, S. (2023). Kurdish Speech Recognition Audio Corpus. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-speech-corpus.v1

title: Kurdish Phonetic Pronunciation Dictionary
description: Comprehensive pronunciation dictionary for Kurdish containing phonetic transcriptions for 75,000 words, including stress patterns and dialectal variations using IPA notation.
structure: Dictionary files with word-pronunciation pairs, IPA transcription standards, Stress pattern annotations, Dialect variation markers
cite: Salar, K., Hama, D., Kareem, H., Ahmed, R., & Jamal, S. (2023). Kurdish Phonetic Pronunciation Dictionary. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-pronunciation.v1

title: Kurdish TTS Voice Dataset
description: High-quality voice dataset for Kurdish TTS development featuring 20 hours of studio-recorded speech from professional Kurdish speakers, with phonetically balanced sentences and emotional variations.
structure: High-quality WAV files (48kHz, 16-bit), Phonetic alignments, Prosodic annotations, Emotional labeling, Recording session metadata
cite: Salar, K., & Hama, D. (2023). Kurdish TTS Voice Dataset. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-tts-voices.v1

title: Kurdish Spelling Error Corpus
description: Comprehensive collection of Kurdish spelling errors gathered from student essays, social media, and online content, with corrections and error type classifications for spell checker development.
structure: Error-correction pairs in CSV format, Error type taxonomies, Context information, Frequency statistics, Morphological error analysis
cite: Dilshad, S., Tahir, N., Omar, Z., Hassan, K., & Ali, A. (2023). Kurdish Spelling Error Corpus. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-spelling-errors.v1

title: Kurdish Morphological Lexicon
description: Extensive morphological lexicon containing root forms, derivational patterns, and inflectional paradigms for Kurdish, designed to support morphological analysis and spell checking applications.
structure: Lexicon entries with morphological features, Derivational rules and patterns, Inflectional paradigm tables, Root-stem mappings
cite: Dilshad, S., & Tahir, N. (2023). Kurdish Morphological Lexicon. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-morphological-lexicon.v1

title: Kurdish News Articles Dataset
description: Collection of 50,000 Kurdish news articles from various sources spanning 2015-2023, categorized by topic and including metadata for summarization and classification research.
structure: Article text files with metadata, Topic categories and tags, Publication dates and sources, Article length statistics, Manual summaries for evaluation
cite: Aziz, B., Kareem, C., Omar, Z., Hassan, K., & Ali, A. (2023). Kurdish News Articles Dataset. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-news-dataset.v1

title: Kurdish Etymological Database
description: Comprehensive etymological database tracking the historical development of Kurdish vocabulary, including loanwords, semantic changes, and cross-linguistic relationships with 25,000+ entries.
structure: Etymology entries with historical forms, Source language information, Semantic evolution tracking, Cross-reference networks, Historical dating
cite: Jamal, R., & Saleh, H. (2023). Kurdish Etymological Database. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-etymology.v1

title: Kurdish Semantic Relations Dataset
description: Structured dataset of semantic relationships between Kurdish words including synonymy, antonymy, hyponymy, and meronymy relationships, supporting dictionary development and NLP applications.
structure: Relation triplets (word1, relation_type, word2), Semantic network graphs, Confidence scores, Manual validation flags, Cross-dialectal mappings
cite: Jamal, R., & Saleh, H. (2023). Kurdish Semantic Relations Dataset. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-semantic-relations.v1

title: Kurdish Text Summarization Gold Standard
description: High-quality gold standard dataset for Kurdish text summarization evaluation, containing 2,000 Kurdish articles with expert-written extractive and abstractive summaries.
structure: Original articles with multiple summary types, Expert annotations and quality scores, Evaluation metrics and guidelines, Inter-annotator agreement data
cite: Aziz, B., & Kareem, C. (2023). Kurdish Text Summarization Gold Standard. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-summarization-gold.v1

title: Kurdish Scientific Terminology Database
description: Comprehensive database of standardized Kurdish scientific terminology covering medicine, engineering, computer science, and natural sciences, with 45,000+ terms and cross-dialect mappings.
structure: Term entries with definitions and translations, Domain categorization, Cross-dialect equivalents, Usage examples and contexts, Etymology and formation patterns
cite: Mohammed, A., Ahmed, G., Karim, S., & Hassan, B. (2023). Kurdish Scientific Terminology Database. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-scientific-terminology.v1

title: Kurdish Terminology Consensus Dataset
description: Dataset documenting the consensus-building process for Kurdish terminology standardization, including expert evaluations, community feedback, and decision rationales for 15,000+ terms.
structure: Term evaluation records, Expert scoring matrices, Community feedback compilation, Decision justifications, Alternative term proposals
cite: Mohammed, A., Ahmed, G., Karim, S., & Hassan, B. (2023). Kurdish Terminology Consensus Dataset. KaiLab Research Data Repository. https://doi.org/10.5281/kurd-terminology-consensus.v1
